import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { AzureUser, AzureGroups } from '../models/Report';
import { AuthService } from '../auth-service/auth.service';


@Component({
  selector: 'app-groups',
  templateUrl: './groups.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./groups.component.css']
})
export class GroupsComponent implements OnInit {
  UserInformation:AzureUser;
  UsersList: AzureUser[] = [];
  GroupsInformation:AzureGroups;
  GroupsList: AzureGroups[] = [];
  constructor(private authService: AuthService) { }

  ngOnInit() {
    this.getListOFGroups();
  }

/**
 * bij dit methode krijgen we een lijst van alle groepen die al bestaan
 */
   getListOFGroups() {
     this.authService.getGroupsList().subscribe(res => {
       res.value.forEach(element => {
         this.GroupsInformation = {
           Id: element.id,
           displayName:element.displayName,
           description:element.description
         }
         this.GroupsList.push(this.GroupsInformation);
        });
     })
   }
}


   <table class="table table-striped">
    <thead>
      <tr class="tr">
        <th scope="col">Nr</th>
        <th scope="col">Group Name</th>
        <th scope="col">Description</th>
        <th scope="col">Users</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      <tr *ngFor="let group of GroupsList; let i = index">
        <th scope="row">{{i+1}}</th>
        <td>{{group.displayName}}</td>
        <td>{{group.description}}</td>
        <td><a [routerLink]="['/rollenbeheer/groups/', group.Id]"><i class="fa fa-info-circle detailsIcon"></i></a></td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
